word:
The Second Temptation
     “Then the devil taketh Him up into the holy city, and setteth Him on a pinnacle of the temple, and saith unto Him, If Thou be the Son of God, cast Thyself down: for it is written: “He shall give His angels charge
174
concerning Thee: and in their hands they shall bear Thee up, lest at any time Thou dash Thy foot against a stone.”—DA 124.
